pageTitle: Current/Elliott The Boyfriend Studded Shorts | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit * Made in the U.S.A. * Dry clean. * 99% cotton/1% elastane. * Fabrication: Stretch denim. * 10" rise. 2" inseam. These cutoff denim shorts feature 5-pocket styling and a single-button closure. Distressed, painted pyramid studs at front pockets and at one back pocket. Worn edges and frayed hem. Peek-a-boo pocket lining. Description Current/Elliott > video play
